code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,Container}from"react-bootstrap";import CreateBrand from"../components/modals/CreateBrand";import CreateDevice from"../components/modals/CreateDevice";import CreateType from"../components/modals/CreateType";import"../styles/Admin.css";import DeleteDevice from"../components/modals/DeleteDevice";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Admin=()=>{const[brandVisible,setBrandVisible]=useState(false);const[typeVisible,setTypeVisible]=useState(false);const[deviceVisible,setDeviceVisible]=useState(false);const[deleteDeviceVisible,setDeleteDeviceVisible]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"admin-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"admin-button",onClick:()=>setTypeVisible(true),children:"\u0414\u043E\u0431\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0442\u0438\u043F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"admin-button",onClick:()=>setBrandVisible(true),children:"\u0414\u043E\u0431\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0431\u0440\u0435\u043D\u0434"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"admin-button",onClick:()=>setDeviceVisible(true),children:"\u0414\u043E\u0431\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0443\u0441\u0442\u0440\u043E\u0439\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"admin-button delete-btn",onClick:()=>setDeleteDeviceVisible(true),children:"\u0423\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0443\u0441\u0442\u0440\u043E\u0439\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteDevice,{show:deleteDeviceVisible,onHide:()=>setDeleteDeviceVisible(false)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateBrand,{show:brandVisible,onHide:()=>setBrandVisible(false),className:"admin-modal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateDevice,{show:deviceVisible,onHide:()=>setDeviceVisible(false),className:"admin-modal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateType,{show:typeVisible,onHide:()=>setTypeVisible(false),className:"admin-modal"})]});};export default Admin;
